message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $90. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $110. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $95. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $105. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $98?
